attributes.action: increase funding for extra curricular activities in schools like music, art and sports.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: In parts of the country much funding has been taken away from these activities - but even the authorities admit that if you give children something to do like playing an instrument it keeps them out of trouble. All children should have the chance of doing these activities.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "increase funding for extra curricular activities in schools like music, art and sports."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11314.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/extrac/
